TopicTitle: Vessel Exploding coming out of warp and loading from Tracking Station

Articles.Content: I have been having the same problem, except i get the on screen messege of "Aprroaching g-limits!" then bam, a part explodes. It happens loading from tracking station, and on landed vessels. I placed a brand new satellite via the cheat menu, went to the tracking station and back, and it does the same thing.
